NL: A balanced diet that includes a variety of fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins can provide essential nutrients and promote overall health and wellness.
FOL: ∀x∀y∀z (BalancedDiet(x) ∧ VarietyOfFruits(y) ∧ Vegetables(z) ∧ LeanProteins(x) ∧ IncludesElements(x, y, z) → ProvidesEssentialNutrients(x) ∧ PromotesOverallHealthAndWellness(x))

NL: A dessert that is made from milk, sugar, and flavorings and is frozen is ice cream.
A food product is labeled organic if it is produced without synthetic pesticides and meets certain regulatory standards.
A healthy diet consisting of a variety of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins promotes overall well-being and reduces the risk of chronic diseases.
If a food is spicy, it contains hot ingredients.
A professional athlete maintains a strict training schedule, adheres to a healthy diet, and prioritizes rest and recovery.
A healthy diet includes fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins, but avoids excessive sugar and saturated fats.
A type of food can be either a fruit or a vegetable.
Fruits that are rich in vitamin C, such as oranges and lemons, can help strengthen the immune system.
A meal is considered healthy if it contains a balanced proportion of proteins, carbohydrates, and fats.
A dessert is more appealing if it has a rich flavor or pleasing presentation, but not if it's high in calories.
A nutritious meal contains a balance of protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats while providing essential vitamins and minerals.
A food is classified as junk food if it has high calories, low nutritional value, and contains excessive amounts of sugar, fat, or salt.
A healthy diet includes a variety of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins.
A food item is perishable if it has a limited shelf life and requires refrigeration or freezing.
A food item that is made from grains, is typically baked, and is a staple in many cultures is bread.
FOL: ∀x∀y (FoodItem(x) ∧ Grains(y) ∧ MadeFrom(x, y) ∧ TypicallyBaked(x) ∧ StapleInManyCultures(x) → Bread(x))

NL: A food is considered spicy if it contains hot flavors.
A food is considered spicy if it contains chili peppers or hot sauce.
A meal is satisfying when it has vegetables and protein.
A person who consumes excessive amounts of sugar is at a higher risk of developing type 2 diabetes.
Fruits with a higher vitamin C content are better at preventing scurvy than those with lower amounts.
A workout is intense if it increases heart rate or burns many calories.
An athlete who follows a rigorous training regimen, consumes a well-balanced diet, and gets enough sleep can maximize their performance potential.
A healthy lifestyle involves regular physical activity, a balanced diet, and sufficient sleep.
